        public static int askOpenInCurrentWindow(Component parent,
                                         String title)
        Asks the user how to open a project: In the current window or a new window
        Parameters:
        parent - parent component
        title - window title
        Returns:
        JOptionPane.YES_OPTION to open in this window; JOptionPane.NO_OPTION to open in a new window; JOptionPane.CANCEL_OPTION to cancel.

                                              Path path,
                                              String title)
        Checks if a file exists and asks the user if it should be overwritten
        Parameters:
        parent - the parent component
        path - the path. can be null, will return false
        title - the title
        Returns:
        true if the path is OK or the user confirmed, otherwise false

      • getSelectionByDialog

        public static <T> List<T> getSelectionByDialog(Component parent,
                                               Collection<T> input,
                                               Collection<T> selected,
                                               String title,
                                               String message,
                                               ListCellRenderer<T> renderer,
                                               ListSelectionMode selectionMode)
        Lets the user select one or multiple items from a list
        Type Parameters:
        T - type
        Parameters:
        parent - parent component
        input - list of input objects
        selected - pre-selected items
        title - the title
        message - the message (can be null to disable message)
        renderer - the renderer for the items (null to use default renderer)
        selectionMode - the selection mode
        Returns:
        selected items or empty list if none was selected

        Parameters:
        parent - the parent component
        component - the component
        title - the title
        Returns:
